title: Short Fiction Workshop
description: A workshop for students with some experience and special interest in writing fiction. This workshop is designed to encourage regular writing in the short forms of prose fiction and to permit students to experiment with various forms. There will be discussion of student work, together with analysis and discussion of representative examples of short fiction from the present and previous ages. Program or materials fees may apply. Students may receive credit for only one of the following: LTWR 100GS, LTWR 100W, or LTWR 100.  Prerequisites:  LTWR 8A; students must apply and be accepted to the Global Seminars program.
